<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Phalanx Formation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3579) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 74

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

</column>

---

You know how to clear a line of fire for your allies. You don't provide lesser cover to enemies against your allies' attacks.
name: Phalanx Formation
